# School Auto Chat - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Offline classroom chat application with TeacherBot for local network communication.

## Key Features
- Real-time chat with WebSocket
- Private and public messaging
- TeacherBot with file search capabilities
- Admin role for teacher
- Modern responsive UI
- Standalone offline operation

## Technology Stack
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Real-time: Socket.IO
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- File Search: Custom TXT/HTML parser
- Package: pkg for EXE creation

## Development Guidelines
- Keep all functionality offline
- Optimize for local network performance
- Ensure responsive design for desktop and mobile
- Implement robust search for educational materials
